title: Colourful table lamp on/off animation controlled by a button

requirements.text: Create a single-page UI that displays a colourful table lamp illustration and a control button that toggles the lamp between ON and OFF states when pressed.

quotes: Animation of colourful Table Lamp switch on and off by pressing button

acceptanceCriteria: A table lamp is visible on the page without requiring any backend calls.
A single button is visible and clickable/tappable on desktop and mobile.
Pressing the button toggles the lamp state between ON and OFF reliably.

requirements.text: Implement a smooth on/off animation for the lamp: when turning ON, the lamp should visibly “light up” (e.g., glow, brighter shade, light cone); when turning OFF, the glow/light should fade out smoothly.

quotes: Animation of colourful Table Lamp switch on and off by pressing button

acceptanceCriteria: ON transition includes a visible brightening/glow effect and completes smoothly (no abrupt jump).
OFF transition fades the light/glow out smoothly (no abrupt jump).
Animation works with repeated rapid toggles (no broken intermediate state).

requirements.text: Make the lamp “colourful” by incorporating multiple vivid colours into the lamp design and/or light effect, and ensure the colour styling remains coherent in both ON and OFF states.

quotes: Animation of colourful Table Lamp switch on and off by pressing button

acceptanceCriteria: Lamp design uses multiple distinct colours (not monochrome).
ON state is clearly more vibrant/bright than OFF state while still matching the same colour palette.
Colours render correctly in modern browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari).

requirements.text: Add user-facing English text labels for the control (e.g., button label changes between “Switch On” and “Switch Off”, or shows current state “Lamp is On/Off”) and ensure basic accessibility (keyboard activation and ARIA where appropriate).

quotes: Animation of colourful Table Lamp switch on and off by pressing button

acceptanceCriteria: All user-facing text is in English.
The button can be toggled using keyboard (Enter/Space).
The button exposes an accessible name and indicates state (e.g., via aria-pressed or equivalent).

requirements.text: Apply a consistent visual theme for the page (layout, typography, and colours) that complements a colourful lamp animation; avoid blue/purple as the primary palette unless necessary.
acceptanceCriteria: UI has a coherent theme (background, typography, spacing) consistent across the page.
Primary look is not dominated by blue/purple tones.

constraints: Frontend must be implemented with React + TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and available template patterns.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths; compose them instead if needed.
Backend changes are not required for this feature; keep the app functional without any backend dependency for the animation.
nonGoals: Persisting lamp state across page reloads.
Multiplayer, real-time synchronization, or chat features.
3D rendering (Three.js) unless required to meet the requested animation (prefer lightweight 2D/SVG/CSS).
